rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Vastu-compliant positioning facing the main road for positive energy. Minimalist Brutalist design.
Open-plan living area with exposed concrete surfaces and high ceilings reflecting Brutalist aesthetics. Vastu principles ensure proper sunlight exposure.
Separate dining space integrated within the living area; designed to encourage family gatherings.
Functional kitchen with durable materials and streamlined design. Positioned according to Vastu for auspicious energy flow.
4BHK bungalow bedroom with a spacious balcony facing east (Vastu favorable) for ample morning light and views. Exposed concrete walls to maintain Brutalist style.
4BHK bungalow bedroom with a spacious balcony facing north (Vastu favorable) for clear views and air circulation. Exposed concrete walls.
4BHK bungalow bedroom with a spacious balcony facing west (Vastu favorable) for cooler evenings and natural light. Exposed concrete elements.
4BHK bungalow bedroom with a spacious balcony facing south (Vastu favorable) for optimal privacy and sun exposure. Brutalist style maintained.
Compact study area integrated in the ground floor for joint family use; designed to complement the minimalist aesthetic.
Multi-purpose dressing and storage room for joint family use.
Service area including bathrooms, laundry, and additional storage space; designed with simplicity in mind.

openings.description: Balcony leading to the rooftop terrace. Designed as a transitional space with minimalistic finishes.
